result.ga: Líon an fhoirm bhuí le do thoil
result.orig: Líon an fhoirm bhuí le do thoil
result.html: Líon an fhoirm bhuí le do thoilFill the yellow form, please.
result.ponchtml: Líon an ḟoirm ḃuí le do ṫoilFill the yellow form, please.

result.eng: Fill the bucket with hot water.
result.ga: Líon an buicéad le huisce te
result.orig: Líon an buicéad le huisce te
result.html: Líon an buicéad le huisce teFill the bucket with hot water.
result.ponchtml: Líon an buicéad le huisce teFill the bucket with hot water.

result.eng: Each man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ga: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.orig: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.html: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ponchtml: D'ól 'aċ aon ḟear acu tarraingt a ċinn den ḃuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.
